name: Abyssal Mayhem: Hydrospout
title: Tartaglia: Hydrospout
in_play_description: End Phase: Deals 1 Piercing DMG to all opposing characters affected by Riptide.

attributes.source: Reward for inviting Tartaglia to a duel at The Cat's Tail and achieving all corresponding challenge objectives

skills.desc:
Combat Action: When your active character is Tartaglia, equip this card.
After Tartaglia equips this card, immediately use Foul Legacy: Raging Tide once.
End Phase: Deals 1 Piercing DMG to all opposing characters affected by Riptide.
(You must have Tartaglia in your deck to add this card to your deck.)
